definition: capable of or tending to change in form or quality or nature
details:
adjective
- capable of or tending to change in form or quality or nature
= synonyms: mutable
- varying in color when seen in different lights or from different angles
= example: varying in color when seen in different lights or from different angles
= synonyms: iridescent
- subject to change
= example: subject to change
= synonyms: uncertain
- such that alteration is possible
= synonyms: changeful
